entry.title: WIND WARNING ENDED, Baddeck
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 6:05 PM ADT Monday 20 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 1.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Eskasoni (First Nations) 6:00 PM ADT Monday 20 March 2023
Temperature: 1.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.3 kPa rising
Humidity: 38 %
Dewpoint: -10.8°C
Wind: WNW 30 km/h gust 50 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind west 50 km/h gusting to 70 except gusting to 90 along parts of the coast early this evening. Wind becoming west 20 gusting to 40 overnight. Low minus 2. Wind chill near minus 11. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Monday 20 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Sunny. High 7.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near noon. High 7. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Monday 20 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Flurries. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Flurries beginning after midnight. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 before morning. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Monday 20 March 2023
